testcase.name: 2. As a valid user, user should be able to login and buy a product.
testcase.system-out: Given user can browse to an application.....................................passed When user land on home page "Spree Demo Site"...............................passed Then user can click on login link...........................................passed And enter "faheemkhatri@yahoo.com" as email address.........................passed And enter "student1" as password............................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed When user logged on to the application......................................passed Then select item "Ruby on Rails Tote".......................................passed And update quantity on cart page............................................passed And click on add to cart button.............................................passed And click on check out button...............................................passed
